label: Vision‑Setting
description: Crafts and communicates a compelling picture of the future, aligning people and resources toward that vision.

proficiency_levels.indicator: States team goals and basic aspirations.
Links near‑term tasks to a clear medium‑term vision.
Articulates multi‑year vision and secures stakeholder sponsorship.
Inspires cross‑functional teams to act on a shared long‑term direction.
Orchestrates enterprise‑wide vision that shapes markets and culture.

label: Systems Thinking for Leaders
description: Understands organizations as dynamic systems and designs interventions that optimize the whole.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Recognizes feedback loops and interdependencies.
Maps causal links to anticipate second‑order effects.
Designs interventions that optimise the whole system, not just parts.
Aligns structures, processes, and culture to systemic insights.
Builds adaptive, learning systems that sustain strategic advantage.

label: Strategic Thinking
description: Synthesizes data and insights to chart long‑range direction that balances opportunity and risk.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Recognizes how routine work supports objectives.
Performs simple SWOT or PESTLE analyses.
Transforms market data into actionable plans.
Builds multi‑horizon roadmaps balancing risk and opportunity.
Shapes industry positioning through scenario planning and portfolio shifts.

label: Strategic Communication
description: Crafts and delivers messages that align, motivate, and drive coordinated action.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Conveys direction with clarity and consistency.
Tailors messages to audience needs and channels.
Aligns narrative to strategy and culture.
Orchestrates multi‑channel campaigns that mobilize action.
Engineers organizational alignment through narrative architecture and storytelling.

label: Stakeholder Coalition Building
description: Identifies, aligns, and mobilizes diverse stakeholders toward shared objectives.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Lists primary stakeholders and concerns.
Communicates project value to gain support.
Negotiates trade‑offs among diverse interests.
Builds multi‑party coalitions that champion change initiatives.
Orchestrates broad networks sustaining long‑term strategic alliances.

label: Situational Leadership
description: Adapts leadership style to follower readiness and situational demands.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Adjusts tone and guidance to follower readiness.
Selects directing/coaching/supporting/delegating style per situation.
Diagnoses development level and adapts quickly under pressure.
Coaches peers in situational‑style agility.
Designs leadership‑pipeline programs grounded in style flexibility.

label: Risk‑Aware Leadership
description: Integrates risk identification, mitigation, and appetite into decision‑making and strategy.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Identifies obvious operational risks.
Records and tracks project risks and mitigations.
Conducts scenario and sensitivity analyses.
Integrates risk appetite into strategic planning.
Embeds enterprise risk‑management systems and culture.

label: Remote & Hybrid Team Leadership
description: Leads distributed teams effectively, ensuring engagement, accountability, and culture cohesion.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Schedules virtual meetings with clear agendas.
Uses digital tools to track commitments and progress.
Establishes norms that support engagement and psychological safety.
Optimizes asynchronous workflows for diverse time zones.
Engineers scalable remote‑work strategy integrated with culture.

label: Mentoring & Coaching
description: Develops others by providing feedback, guidance, and growth opportunities.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Shares knowledge informally.
Provides constructive feedback.
Sets learning goals and uses coaching questions.
Establishes structured mentoring programs and measures impact.
Builds an enterprise coaching culture aligned to strategy.

label: Innovation Leadership
description: Fosters a culture where novel ideas are generated, tested, and scaled for advantage.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Encourages sharing of new ideas.
Allocates time for small experiments.
Funds pilot projects and measures learning.
Builds innovation pipelines with portfolio management.
Shapes a culture where experimentation drives strategic advantage.

label: Influence Without Authority
description: Motivates and secures commitment from individuals or groups over whom one has no formal control.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Gains informal cooperation on simple tasks.
Builds credibility and rapport across functions.
Negotiates resources and commitment without direct power.
Mobilizes cross‑boundary coalitions for strategic initiatives.
Orchestrates enterprise change leveraging networks over hierarchy.

label: Inclusive Leadership
description: Creates an environment where all individuals feel respected, valued, and able to contribute.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Values different perspectives and avoids biased language.
Ensures all voices are heard in meetings.
Removes systemic barriers and adapts communication for diverse groups.
Champions inclusive policies and equity metrics.
Embeds inclusion into strategy, brand, and talent pipelines.

label: Ethical Governance
description: Ensures decisions and behaviours align with legal, moral, and societal expectations.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Follows code of conduct.
Identifies ethical dilemmas and seeks guidance.
Weighs stakeholder impacts and mitigates conflicts of interest.
Champions ethical decision frameworks across teams.
Engineers organization‑wide ethics programs and public accountability processes.

label: Delegation Mastery
description: Assigns responsibility and authority to others at the right level to build capacity and achieve results.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Hands off straightforward tasks with supervision.
Matches task complexity to capability.
Coordinates distributed ownership of deliverables.
Delegates stretch assignments to accelerate growth.
Designs scalable delegation systems that build capacity organization‑wide.

label: Decision‑Making & Judgment
description: Applies structured thinking and ethical reasoning to choose the best course of action.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Seeks relevant data before deciding on routine issues.
Chooses among options using defined criteria.
Balances analytical evidence with stakeholder input.
Makes high‑stakes decisions under uncertainty with transparent rationale.
Sets enterprise decision frameworks integrating risk appetite and strategy.

label: Crisis Leadership
description: Leads under extreme volatility, ambiguity, and pressure while preserving mission and people.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Stabilizes immediate safety and communication.
Implements contingency plans and allocates critical resources.
Leads teams under pressure, balancing mission and people care.
Builds antifragile cultures that learn and improve through crises.
Anticipates, prepares for, and exploits disruptions, strengthening institutional resilience.

label: Conflict Resolution
description: Navigates disagreements to arrive at constructive, sustainable solutions.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Recognizes tension and listens actively.
Uses neutral language to ease minor disputes.
Facilitates discussions to reach mutually acceptable solutions.
Mediates complex, high‑stakes conflicts.
Designs conflict‑management systems and trains mediators.

label: Change Leadership
description: Guides individuals and organizations through transitions, uncertainty, and reinvention.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Explains rationale for change initiatives.
Uses simple change‑management tools.
Develops change plans and monitors adoption metrics.
Leads enterprise transformations with multi‑stakeholder alignment.
Establishes sustainable change capability embedded in culture.

label: Self‑Motivation
description: Initiates and sustains actions without external encouragement; driven to achieve personal and organizational goals.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Completes tasks when assigned.
Seeks opportunities to improve and contribute.
Sets and pursues own performance goals.
Models proactive behavior that inspires others.
Establishes systems and culture for intrinsic motivation and excellence.

label: Resilience
description: Demonstrates the ability to recover from setbacks, adversity, or pressure.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Acknowledges stress but maintains basic functioning.
Returns to baseline performance after minor challenges.
Handles sustained pressure while meeting responsibilities.
Develops support strategies for personal and team resilience.
Implements resilience programming at the organizational level.

label: Learning Agility
description: Quickly acquires and applies new knowledge and skills in evolving contexts.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Recognizes the need for learning new skills.
Seeks learning opportunities and applies them.
Adapts learning strategies to various contexts.
Teaches others and applies insights across domains.
Drives organizational learning and adaptive strategy.

label: Emotional Intelligence
description: Recognizes, understands, and manages one’s own emotions and the emotions of others.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Acknowledges personal feelings and observes emotions in others.
Manages responses and communicates feelings constructively.
Anticipates emotional triggers and adapts behaviour.
Navigates complex emotional dynamics in teams.
Fosters emotionally intelligent cultures and coaching models.

label: Critical Thinking
description: Analyzes facts to form judgments and solve problems effectively.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Recognizes when an issue needs deeper thought.
Identifies patterns and asks clarifying questions.
Applies structured reasoning to evaluate alternatives.
Develops decision frameworks for complex problems.
Shapes organizational strategy using rigorous analysis and logic.

label: Collaboration
description: Works cooperatively with others to achieve shared goals and support group efforts.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Participates in group discussions and activities.
Shares information and supports team members.
Coordinates tasks and resolves minor conflicts.
Facilitates collaboration across departments or disciplines.
Designs and leads strategic cross‑functional collaboration initiatives.

label: Adaptability
description: Adjusts effectively to changing environments, tasks, and responsibilities.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Notices and accepts basic changes in routine.
Adjusts to minor shifts in process or environment.
Remains effective despite unexpected change.
Guides others through transitions while maintaining stability.
Champions adaptive culture and frameworks across functions.

label: Accountability
description: Takes responsibility for outcomes, actions, and decisions while upholding integrity.

proficiency_levels.indicator: Acknowledges errors when pointed out.
Takes ownership of assigned tasks.
Accepts consequences and learns from mistakes.
Promotes a culture of accountability in teams.
Establishes accountability frameworks and ethical standards.
